cause.description:
What has the world come to if fighting has to occur so that something "good" can be accomplished. Why are people still being racist and sexist. We are all on the same planet, we all breathe the same way, and all our hearts beat the same beat. Everyone just needs to acknowlegde that fact.
"Where is the love?"
Spread the peace. Kindness is attractive. Pay it Forward.
1. Peace in the world amung all men and women, black or white, big or small, American or Indian or British.
2. Hate must end.
3. Love wins.
4. Peace Everywhere.
cause.mission: Stop the fighting and the hate that goes on everyday around the world.
cause.name: Peace on our World
